fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night you are awakened, attack two players
- Curse a player, setting their defense to vulnerable and causing protective abilities to fail on them for the rest of the game. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game unawakened. You become awakened when a player visits you for the first time
- The player who awakened you is automatically cursed
- You have a powerful autovest. When youâ€™re attacked for the first time, your bandages unravel and you gain another use of curse

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose you, or have the game end without you being awakened
